content: Do you know any jokes about money?

Sure, here's one for you:

Why don't some couples go to the gym?

Because some relationships don't work out!

Wait, that's not about money. Let me try again.

Why did the dollar bill go to the doctor?

Because it was feeling a little crumpled!

Hmm, maybe not the best joke. How about this one?

Why did the banker go to art school?

Because he wanted to learn how to make money!

Okay, that one is a bit old, but I hope it makes you smile. If you have any other questions or need more jokes, feel free to ask!
